articles.title: Wipro CEO sees growing demand for India's IT services from AI
articles.description: DAVOS, Switzerland, Jan 20 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence is underpinning technology deals that ‌Indian software services providers are competing for, as companies move from AI ‌test deployments to large projects, Wipro CEO Srini Pallia said.
articles.content:

articles.title: AI drives new deal pipeline as Wipro bids for small and large projects
articles.description: AI is powering new technology deals as Wipro bids for small and mega projects, with clients shifting from AI pilots to ROI-driven deployments.
articles.content:
Artificial intelligence is underpinning ‌technology deals that Indian software services providers are ​competing for, as companies move from AI test deployments to large projects, Wipro CEO Srini Pallia said.

articles.title: US stocks slide as Trump threatens tariffs on 8 European nations over Greenland
articles.description: US stocks suffered their sharpest fall in months as technology shares led losses, safe-haven assets surged, global markets weakened, and investors weighed inflation risks amid escalating trade uncertainty.
articles.content:
Stocks slumped on Wall Street Tuesday after President Donald Trump threatened to hit eight European countries with new tariffs as tensions escalate over his attempts to assert American control over Greenland.
The losses were widespread, with nearly e... [4857 chars]

articles.title: City police to deploy ‘AI Nirikshak’ for crowd management at India-New Zealand T20 match
articles.description: as thousands of cricket fans are expected to pour into the city for the india vs new zealand t20 international match at vca’s jamtha stadium on january 21, nagpur police are turning to cutting-edge technology to ensure safety and smooth crowd movement. for the high-profile match, the city police will deploy ‘ai nirikshak’, india’s first ai-driven crowd management and intelligence platform. the tool has been developed under the guidance of commissioner of police dr ravinder kumar singal. the platform was lau
articles.content:
CP Dr Ravinder Kumar Singal taking review of the AI tool.
Staff Reporter :

articles.title: Asia Pacific Tech Services Market Slumps in Q4: ISG Index™
articles.description: Asia Pacific’s market for technology services declined sharply in Q4, on lower demand for both cloud services and managed services: ISG Index.
articles.content: SYDNEY--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Asia Pacific’s market for technology services and software declined sharply in the fourth quarter, on lower demand for both cloud services and managed services, the latest state-of-the-industry report from Information Service... [5151 chars]

articles.title: SRIHER celebrates 20 years of its cochlear implantation programme
articles.description: SRIHER celebrates 20 years of its cochlear implantation program, highlighting success stories and advancements in hearing technology.
articles.content:
It was a heartwarming moment when K. Karthick Kalyani stood alongside Lieutenant Colonel A. Ravikumar, founder of Cochlear Implant Program of SRIHER (CLIPS), two decades after he performed her cochlear implant surgery.
